div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Tick-Borne Encephalitis vaccine according to the defined schedule

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis - No Doses
description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis using FSME-Immun because no doses on a 3 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis using FSME-Immun because no doses on a 3 dose scheme
"Country recognizes TBE as a priority" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis using FSME-Immun because no doses on a 3 dose scheme

tr.td: "Patient has completed TBE primary series" = TRUE
